sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Auction Sales Sign Act.

sections.heading: The use of any signs, billboards, flags, banners or other media
sections.text:
commonly used to designate that an auction is being held, or is going to be
held, is prohibited unless the bidding on all sales of goods in the place
so designated is open to the general public.

sections.heading: Whoever violates the provisions of this Act shall be guilty of a Class B
